results.title: Prevention of angiotensin II induced myocyte necrosis and coronary vascular damage by lisinopril and losartan in the rat.
results.text_hl: Prevention of @GENE_AGT @GENE_24179 @@@angiotensin II@@@ induced myocyte @DISEASE_Necrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D009336 @@@necrosis@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Aneurysm</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003323 @@@coronary vascular damage@@@ by @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Losartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019808 @@@losartan@@@ in the @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@.

citations.NLM: Kabour A, Henegar JR, Devineni VR, Janicki JS. Prevention of angiotensin II induced myocyte necrosis and coronary vascular damage by lisinopril and losartan in the rat. Cardiovasc Res. 1995 Apr;29(4):543-8. PMID: 7796449
citations.BibTeX: @article{7796449, title={Prevention of angiotensin II induced myocyte necrosis and coronary vascular damage by lisinopril and losartan in the rat.}, author={Kabour A and Henegar JR and Devineni VR and Janicki JS}, journal={Cardiovasc Res}, volume={29}, number={4}, pages={543-8}}

results.title: Therapy of hypertensive cardiac hypertrophy and impaired coronary microcirculation.
results.text_hl: The @GENE_ACE @GENE_24310 @@@angiotensin-converting enzyme@@@ inhibitor @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ was shown to improve @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Aneurysm</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003323 @@@coronary@@@ reserve and to reserve both @DISEASE_Hypertrophy @DISEASE_MESH:D006984 @@@medial hypertrophy@@@ and @DISEASE_Fibrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@myocardial fibrosis@@@ in SHRs.

citations.NLM: Motz W, Strauer BE. Therapy of hypertensive cardiac hypertrophy and impaired coronary microcirculation. J Cardiovasc Pharmacol. 1994;24 Suppl 1():S34-8. PMID: 7533225
citations.BibTeX: @article{7533225, title={Therapy of hypertensive cardiac hypertrophy and impaired coronary microcirculation.}, author={Motz W and Strauer BE}, journal={J Cardiovasc Pharmacol}, volume={24 Suppl 1}, pages={S34-8}}

results.title: [Undesirable effects and interaction to angiotensin converting enzyme inhibitors therapy].
results.journal: Rev Med Chir Soc Med Nat Iasi
results.text_hl: Different generations of ACE inhibitors were used, but @CHEMICAL_Captopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002216 @@@captopril@@@, @CHEMICAL_Enalapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004656 @@@enalapril@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lysinopril@@@ were the most commonly administered.

citations.NLM: Ionescu SD, Sandru V, Leuciuc E, Manea P, Burdujan A, Tovarniţchi S, Cosovanu A. [Undesirable effects and interaction to angiotensin converting enzyme inhibitors therapy]. Rev Med Chir Soc Med Nat Iasi. 2002 Jan-Mar;106(1):128-31. PMID: 12635373
citations.BibTeX: @article{12635373, title={[Undesirable effects and interaction to angiotensin converting enzyme inhibitors therapy].}, author={Ionescu SD and Sandru V and Leuciuc E and Manea P and Burdujan A and Tovarniţchi S and Cosovanu A}, journal={Rev Med Chir Soc Med Nat Iasi}, volume={106}, number={1}, pages={128-31}}
